content: {"name": " FLASH X U.N.I.T.Y Pop-Up Cafe", "alternate_name": "", "description": "FLASH is a nonprofit Pop-up caf\u00e9 experience hosted weekly at UNITY FEC Richmond Hill, supported almost entirely by rescued, donated, or surplus goods. FLASH aims to create a welcoming, low-barrier environment for community members to enjoy free coffee and pastries, connect with local programming, and access costless resources in a warm, dignified setting.\n(https://www.thegatonfoundation.org)", "email": "", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/thegatonfoundation/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "111-20 Jamaica Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Richmond Hill", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11418", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6971399, "longitude": -73.8364862}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 893-8265", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}]}
